data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Aichi to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aichi, Japan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Aichi, Japan. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Aichi, Japan.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 41,947 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Aichi, Japan to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Amami-Oshima, Southern people.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Aichi to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Aichi, Japan.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Aichi, Japan, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

location.name: Aichi
